snippet.title: Off The Grid - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into the heat of a covert corporate war in Off The Grid, a cyberpunk Battle Royale 2.0 multiplayer shooter where you shape the story and the gameplay. 
Unfolding on a dystopian tropical island, OTG sends you on head-spinning assassination and sabotage missions to the greater glory and market share of your chosen faction. Tool up for 2023: it’s about to get bloody! 

Visit the official website to learn more: https://playoffthegrid.com 

Follow the development: 
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/GunzillaGames
👉 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gunzillagames/
👉 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GunzillaGames/

#OffTheGrid #OTG #GunzillaGames #BattleRoyale
